meanings.sent1: The unadmired painting sat unnoticed in the corner of the gallery.
meanings.sent2: Her unadmired efforts went unnoticed by her peers.
meanings.sent3: The unadmired cake was left untouched at the party.
meanings.sent4: The unadmired building stood lonely amidst the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The unadmired student felt invisible in the classroom.
